1.content:
"What?! you can't do this!" you cry at the door of your lair.
"Yes I can." replied Gardurple. Gardurple was a rather selfish goblin, more so than others. He's very easy to bribe, which is why Sneezles, your rival, bribed him with some gold to keep you out. There's always been a feud between you two, particularly on who is the most attractive. She's quite skinny, and you're very curvy. This quarrel has been going on for months and now, it seems that this is the final straw.
"When I get in there, I'll...I'll" You didn't get much farther, as he and Sneezles laugh behind the barred door. You turn around in despair, you'll now need to survive on your own. You travel several miles from your former lair and it's now getting to be dusk. As you walk up a hill, you can see a carriage at the bottom. You dash into a nearby bush and peer at the cart. From what you could see, it looks like some sort of potion vendor. You sneak out of the bush and get a closer peek. Getting closer reveals that the cart is a traveling business shop called "Paddie's Potions." You maneuver to the back and see a door to the inside of the carriage, locked of course. Fortunately though, you have experience with locks, and you open it after five minutes. Slowly, you creep in and see that the owner is leaned back in his chair, asleep. You can see many different potions around on shelves you can't reach. Though, there are some you can reach. They're all labeled and corked loosely. You look around, and decide to take the potion labeled.....
1.title: Thrown Out!

choices: Find another potion of Great Growth
Take some other kind of potion. Why stop now?
Perhaps there's something else on your mind.
11.content:
You were slightly unsure what was the difference between the potion of "Giant Strength" and "Great Growth", but frankly, you didn't cared too much either way.

Taking the potion by random out of those two, your hand lied on the potion of Great Growth, which you immediately uncorked and eagerly gulped down. It has a nice strawberry flavour, nice bonus!

But before you felt anything within your body, you were suddenly pulled into a chokehold by the owner of the store, if you were just a tiny bit more careful you would've heard him stopping snoring, but alas, the excitement was too big.

"Darned goblins, always trying to steal my goods!" You heard him blurt in anger as you unsuccessfully tried to free yourself from his hold. Paddie wasn't strong by any means, but you were smaller and weaker.
Well, at least for now.

While busy trying to wrestle with the owner, you didn't felt a lingering tingling in your whole body. By seconds, as growth started, you felt that you actually managed to slowly starting to overcome the angry owner in this struggle.

By 4th feet you were able to breath again.

By 5th feet, you managed to break the hold completely.

By 6th feet, your tatters that you proudly called clothes before snapped off you, and you managed to pin shocked owner down.

And only then you noticed, that you were now just a tiny bit, but taller than this human. Joy overcame you, as you started to giggle uncontrollably.
You knew that you had power to deal with those idiots back in your den! Get your revenge, take the den for yourself. You felt all giddy inside.

But for now, you needed to deal with the owner. Or perhaps take another drink, being even taller would certainly help.
11.title: Goblin in charge

112.content:
A grin comes across your face as you grab some more potions of Great Growth. The shopkeeper fell over in surprise and now cowers in fear. You were so caught up in your fun, that you didn't realize how many potions you guzzled down.

How many did you drink?
112.title: Find another potion of Great Growth

choices: Continue drinking the Giant's Strength potions.
Guzzle down the Succubus Lust Essence. <Futa/TF>
12.content: This'll be useful. you think as you quietly uncork the Giant's Strength bottle and chug it down. You can feel your muscles tightening and expanding, your clothes getting tighter. You've gained some serious muscle, as you look noticeably more muscular. Despite that, you're still short, standing at 3 ft. You could try and find a potion that would make you grow, or keep drinking Giant's Strength potions. Alternatively, you could try other potions entirely. Then again, the shopkeep is still around, but is asleep. Decisions, Decisions, Decisions.
12.title: Potion of Giant's Strength. <Muscles>

choices: Drink the Potion of Great Growth. <Giantess/Growth>
Drink the Potion of Giant's Strength. <Muscle Growth>
Drink the Potion of Gelatinous Form. <Slime TF>
14.content: You shrug as you uncork the milky white liquid and down it, it tasted equally sweet and salty. Then, you feel something grow in between your legs.You want to moan, but you do your best to keep quiet as to not awake the shop owner. Your tattered pants start to strain and then eventually rip. A quiet gasp leaves you in awe as now a 14" long and 1/2" wide cock dangled from between your legs. You look back at the shop keep, who is still asleep, and a grin crawls across your face. It's time for mischief, what will you do?
14.title: Succubus Lust Essence. <Futa TF>

choices: Paddie only pretended to be asleep
15.content:
Of course, those potions don't interest you and you move on, taking a ladder nearby and convenient. As you take a step towards the next set, a creak comes out of the floor and you freeze when the owner's snoring stops, but it eventually resumes after several agonizing seconds. You quietly release a breath of your pent up panic and return back to your looting, while keeping an eye on the feminine man.
The potion maker, Paddie (if it was his real name), was the attractive beauty, as his beautiful face could have made people mistaken him for a woman, as his purple hair was a bowl cut, and despite the purple robes hanging on him loosely, it was obviously very tight around his massively wide hips. With seriously thick thighs, each of his cheeks was big enough to hold you inside and his eyes were a violet color with a yellow, four point star for pupils, unbeknownst to you.
Grabbing a random potion that caught your eye, you silently slide down the ladder and see that it was...
15.title: More Options

choices: Unleash your gas - try and knock out everybody!
Keep holding it in - inflate, and demonstrate your gassy dominance!
Ask to see Sneezles - give her a taste of your newfound power!
152.content:
After having grabbed the bottle labeled "Potion of Intestinal Storms," you turn to face the large, effeminate man, just to make sure that he still not yet awakened, and once you've confirmed he is still soundly asleep, you hastily take the potion in hand and slide down the ladder, back onto the earth below you, and make your way back into the woodlands.

After creating some distance from the carriage, you decide to take a rest, and sit down to examine the bottle further, making sure of what it can do, and the potential side effects. You think to yourself, Huh... a potion that makes you break wind like nobody's business - this is exactly what I need! Flatulence is seen as attractive amongst goblinfolk, and as if your curvaceous figure wasn't already attractive enough, once you start blasting some bad gas like there's no tomorrow, you'll be irresistible. That is, you think to yourself, if I even WANT their affection - those bozos wouldn't know true beauty if it slapped them in the face... Hmmm. I know what I must do! I must show them just how wrong they were, and assert my dominance as the ideal goblin girl!

But, to do that, you'll have to get yourself all fueled up first. So, there's no time like the present - you wrap your hand around the cork of the bottle, and take it out with ease. After tossing the cork aside, you proceed to gulp down the potion in one large swig, resulting in a small belch. You double-check the label, and the effects of the potion are not yet immediate, but will take place in about one hour - just enough time for you to make your way back to your den and show the others who's boss!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------

You've arrived back at the Goblin Den, and you see before you the same barred door that graced your exit prior. The Den was more like a cave or underground lair, with the doorway acting as the only means to get in or out. As you arrive at the door, you feel your stomach begin to gurgle and rumble - the gas is starting to build up in your system, as a result of the potion. You even push out a few toots.

Brrrrp
Brrrt
Brrrrrpppphhtt

Your butt's just warming up - you rub your belly in delight, as you feel more and more bloated with each passing second. The level of farting increases.

BRRRRRPP!
BRRRRPPHHT!

Damn, you think to yourself, these are some fine farts! I must say, this potion worked better than I expected... now, I wonder... You decide to clench your butt, trying to hold the gas in - the rumbling in your stomach begins to increase, and the bloating starts to develop into a slight swelling of the stomach. You know that by holding farts in, you can build up their force - it might just be enough to blast the door open! Butt still clenched, you walk up right in front of the door, turn to have your back face towards it, and then press your butt up against it. "Time to let her rip!" you exclaim, as you relax your butt and proceed to push out a large, concentrated blast of gas right into the door, resulting in a hole large enough for you to squeeze through.

BRRRRRRR-BRRRRAAAAAAPPHHHTT!!

Your stomach is deflated, back to normal, but you still have a little gas left in your system. You quickly turn to face the hole and squeeze through, some farts getting squeezed out of you as well.

BRRRRAAAaaaapppp!
BRRRTTTT!

As you make your way down the stone steps towards the center of the den, two goblin guards make their way up towards you - undoubtedly, they heard your butt blast open the door that leads into their lair. You stop on the stairway and quickly turn to poke your butt out towards the oncoming guards, and proceed to send them tumbling down the stairs with a mighty fart.

BRRRRRAAAAAAAPPPTT!!

You turn around and proceed down the stairs, only to see your former group of goblinfolk all standing in the center of the lair dumbfounded, but also impressed. You puff out your chest and declare, "Fellow Goblins! I have returned to give you a piece of my mind - how dare you kick me out of the Den?!" One of the other goblins pipes up and says, "A-Actually, it was the Master, Gardurple who banished you! We had nothing to do with that!" You smirk and reply, "Yeah, you're right! HEY, GARDURPLE!"

As you shout, you see the other goblins push Gardurple out in front of the crowd. He is visibly irritated by what his clan of goblins has done, but before he says anything to them, he turns to face you, a look of worry on his face.

"Y-You... what are you doing here?!" He shrieks. "I told you that you had no place in this clan!" You've been holding in in your gas for about a minute, now, and the swelling in your stomach has become quite noticeable - while flatulence is seen as attractive to goblinfolk, your flatulence is unlike anything they have ever seen before. They're somewhat intimidated by you.

What do you do?
152.title: Gassy Goblin Gal

154.content:
...a big shadow that developed you and you turn to see Paddie standing before you, rightfully pissed off.
"What the fuck do you think you're doing?" He loudly asked angrily, snatching the potion from your hands.
"Taking revenge against those that have wronged me!" You reply back, though his glare weakened your resolve.
"I still dislike the idea where I am robbed!" He shouted and he grabbed your neck with a steel like grip; very unusual for a human to have.
"It's- it's not like you would have bothered letting me look at your shit at all," you said as the pressure increased around your neck and that was enough to stop him.
"Like you had any money at all," he said, his feminine voice filled with mockery as looks over the first you call clothes, but he stops and rubs his chin with the other hand.
"...Bbbbuuuutttt I could do a trade. If you help out with a little experiment of mine, I may be willing to give you a potion. It would be bad if I turned a potential buyer away," he said after some much needed thought, though the malice in his girlish voice made it really unbearable.
"Sure, what you need to do?" You answer, as of this point, you just wanted to leave.
He smiles a toothy grin at you while he pulls a blue swirled with yellow potion from his sleeve and downs it quickly.
"Need to improve the taste," he grimace, his lovely face cramping and he rubs his tummy for a bit.
"Wasn't I suppose to drink that?" You ask and you immediately regret it as he giggles at the comment.
"You're here for the aftereffects of the potion, sweetheart. I know what it does. I just want to know...

1)... If you'll survive the digestive process," he said, opening his mouth wide to swallow your small form whole.

2)... How my farts are affected," he said, tossing you into his chair and quickly slamming his massive, bare ass on you before letting it rip.

3)... How my cock will tear into you," he said, striping down and showing off his massive cock.
154.title: The angry shopkeeper

info.brief_description: A little goblin lady has had enough!
info.description:
In the land of Faerûn, a little goblin girl has had enough! She had just been kicked out of her den and now want revenge against not just them, but the rest of the lands.....

Just a few rules to keep in mind
- This is the Faerûn in D&D 5e, just to keep a timeframe in mind.
- Please write in the second person. (You did this, you saw that, etc.)
- Serious entries please, no "meme" or "joke" entries allowed.
- The main character must not die and must be female. However, I will allow futa options.
- In reguards to fetish, I'll allow most things but; scat, watersports, and toilet entries must be warned ahead of time.

FAILURE TO FOLLOW THESE RULES WILL RESULT IN YOUR ENTRY BEING DELETED

Other than that, have fun!
